original_text: And ye have seen their abominations, and their idols, wood and stone, silver and gold, which were among them:)
korean_text: 너희가 또 그들 중에 있는 가증한 것과 목석과 은금의 우상을 보았느니라)

sentences.original_text: And ye have seen their abominations
wood and stone, silver and gold
sentences.korean_translation: 나무와 돌, 은과 금으로 만든 것들을
